checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation page from Settings > Payroll
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'Daily Wage Calculation'
checks.assertion: Page should be accessible and display Daily Wage Calculation configuration interface

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options are available (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation basis selection
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options should be selectable: calendar days, working days, custom days

checks.description: Verify salary components selection interface exists
checks.selector_hint: checkboxes or multi-select for salary components
checks.assertion: User should be able to select which salary components to include in daily wage calculation

checks.description: Verify system acknowledges variable month lengths in calculation
checks.selector_hint: help text, tooltip, or remarks field mentioning month length variations
checks.assertion: Documentation or UI should indicate that calculations vary by month length (31, 30, 28/29 days)

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'End of Service' and 'Configure'
checks.assertion: Page should be accessible and display EOS configuration interface

checks.description: Verify salary component selection for leave encashment (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for salary component selection
checks.assertion: User should be able to choose between Basic Only or Basic + Allowances

checks.description: Verify calculation method options for leave encashment
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation method
checks.assertion: All calculation methods should be available: calendar days, working days, custom days

checks.description: Verify ability to configure specific leave types for end-of-service calculations
checks.selector_hint: checkboxes or list for leave type selection
checks.assertion: User should be able to select which leave types apply to EOS calculations

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing which eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten
checks.selector_hint: warning message, badge, or visual indicator for policy overrides
checks.assertion: Super admin should see clear indication of which policies will be overwritten by EOS configuration

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to Unpaid Leave configuration in Leave Policies
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'Leave Policies' and 'Unpaid Leave'
checks.assertion: Page should be accessible and display Unpaid Leave configuration interface

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing payroll daily wage calculator takes precedence
checks.selector_hint: greyed-out formula field, disabled state, or precedence messaging
checks.assertion: Formula field should display override state indicating payroll settings take precedence over leave policy

checks.description: Verify day calculation type field displays current configuration
checks.selector_hint: dropdown or radio button for day calculation type (calendar/working/custom)
checks.assertion: Day calculation type should be visible and indicate current selection

checks.description: Verify formula display shows greyed-out state when overridden by payroll settings
checks.selector_hint: formula field with reduced opacity or disabled appearance
checks.assertion: Formula should appear greyed-out or disabled when payroll override is active

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify indicator showing global configuration overrides policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: warning message, info icon, or disabled field indicating global precedence
checks.assertion: UI should clearly indicate that global unpaid leave daily rate settings override policy-level configurations

checks.description: Verify policy-level customization fields and their enabled/disabled state
checks.selector_hint: calculation method fields in leave policy configuration
checks.assertion: Fields should display current enabled/disabled state based on global configuration hierarchy

checks.description: Verify messaging about configuration hierarchy is present
checks.selector_hint: help text, tooltip, or remarks explaining override hierarchy
checks.assertion: Documentation should explain that global settings take precedence over policy-level settings

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify daily wage formula display in EOS configuration
checks.selector_hint: formula field or remarks showing calculation method
checks.assertion: Formula should be visible and display the configured daily wage calculation (e.g., basic + allowances / 30)

checks.description: Verify calculation method field displays current configuration
checks.selector_hint: dropdown or radio button for calculation basis
checks.assertion: Calculation method should display selected option (calendar days, working days, or custom days)

checks.description: Verify salary component selection state is displayed
checks.selector_hint: selected option in salary component field
checks.assertion: Selected salary components should be visible (Basic Only or Basic + Allowances)

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify day calculation type configuration affects leave salary calculation
checks.selector_hint: dropdown or radio button for day calculation type
checks.assertion: User should be able to select calculation divisor (calendar days, working days, custom days)

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing policy-driven calculation precedence
checks.selector_hint: messaging or field state indicating configuration hierarchy
checks.assertion: UI should indicate that leave salary calculation is based on policy configuration

checks.description: Verify transparent explanation of leave salary calculation method
checks.selector_hint: help text, tooltip, or remarks explaining calculation logic
checks.assertion: Documentation should explain how leave salary is calculated based on policy configuration

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify remarks field displays daily wage calculation details
checks.selector_hint: remarks or notes field showing daily rate and day count
checks.assertion: Remarks field should be present and display calculated daily rate information

checks.description: Verify remarks display shows correct number of days for the month
checks.selector_hint: remarks field text showing day count reference
checks.assertion: Remarks should display the actual calendar days for the month (29 for February in leap year, 31 for January, etc.)

checks.description: Verify daily rate value displayed in remarks matches calculation basis
checks.selector_hint: remarks field showing daily rate amount
checks.assertion: Daily rate should be calculated and displayed based on actual month length

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify stored daily rate from leave occurrence month is displayed
checks.selector_hint: remarks or rate field showing stored initial calculation
checks.assertion: Daily rate should display the rate from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month

checks.description: Verify daily rate remains consistent across payroll cycles
checks.selector_hint: remarks field showing daily rate value
checks.assertion: Daily rate should not change based on payroll processing month; should preserve initial calculation

checks.description: Verify clarity about which month's rate is being displayed
checks.selector_hint: label or tooltip indicating month context for daily rate
checks.assertion: UI should clearly indicate whether rate is from leave month or processing month

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options for salary proration
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation basis selection
checks.assertion: All calculation bases should be available: custom days, calendar days, working days

checks.description: Verify messaging about payroll month state and transaction handling
checks.selector_hint: warning message or info text about open payroll months
checks.assertion: UI should indicate when payroll month is open and prorated transactions exist

checks.description: Verify guidance on rejecting and resaving prorated transactions
checks.selector_hint: help text or tooltip explaining transaction management
checks.assertion: Documentation should explain that super admin must reject and resave transactions when changing settings

checks.description: Verify messaging about impact on active unpaid amounts
checks.selector_hint: warning or info message about changes affecting payroll table
checks.assertion: UI should indicate that changes affect all active (unpaid) amounts in payroll table
